root.name: Hatsune Miku and Future Stars: Project Mirai
root.description: OverviewHatsune Miku and Future Stars: Project Mirai is a Vocaloid-themed rhythm game for the Nintendo 3DS. Unlike the Hatsune Miku: Project Diva series of rhythm games, it features super deformed versions of the Vocaloid characters, as well as rhythm mechanics more suited to the 3DS platform.
